extension.name: JF FlexSlider
extension.author: JoomForest.com
extension.description:
JoomForest - JF Social (Joomla Module)
Name:JF FlexSlider
Version:1.2
Release Date:08.02.13
Description:Joomla FlexSlider v2.1, Only For "JF Social" Joomla 2.5 Template
NOTE!:This module works only on Joomla 2.5. PLEASE dont forget to read documentation.
Website:http://www.joomforest.com/
Support:http://www.joomforest.com/support.html - Support you can get only on our forum.
Follow US:
  • This Module is base on "wooThemes" FlexSlider - http://flexslider.woothemes.com/
Copyright (C) 2012 JoomForest.com

field.name: jfFlexAnimSpd
field.label: Animation Speed
field.description: Type Animation Speed between Slides (default is '8000' = 8 seconds).

field.name: jfFlexInImgAnimSpd
field.label: Inside Slider Speed
field.description: Type Images Animations Speed Inside Slider (default is '600').

field.name: jfFlexControlNav
field.label: Control Navigation
field.description: Choose Enable or to Disable Control Navigation.

field.name: jfFlexDirctNav
field.label: Direct Navigation
field.description: Choose Enable or to Disable Direct Navigation.

field.name: jfFlexPauseOnHov
field.label: Pause On Hover
field.description: Choose Enable or to Disable Pause On Hover.

field.name: jfFlexKeyboard
field.label: Keyboard Navigation
field.description: Choose Enable or to Disable Slider Navigating via Keyboard Left/Right Keys.

field.name: jfFlexMousewheel
field.label: Mousewheel Navigation
field.description: Choose Enable or to Disable Slider Navigating via Mousewheel

field.name: jfFlexTouch
field.label: Touch Swipe Navigation
field.description: Choose Enable or to Disable touch swipe navigation of the slider on enabled devices

field.name: jfFlexSlideDirect
field.label: Slide Direction
field.description: Choose Slide Direction.

field.name: jfFlexReverse
field.label: Reverse Direction
field.description: Choose Enable or to Disable Reverse The Animation Direction.

field.name: jfFlexRandomize
field.label: Randomize Slide Order
field.description: Choose Enable or to Disable Randomize Slide Order, on load.

field.name: jfFlex_loadjquery
field.label: jQuery
field.description: If you dont use jQuery library on your website, than enable it. (NOTE! if you use our 'JF Social' joomla template, you don't need to enable it.)

field.name: jfFlex_loadjquery_noconflict
field.label: jQuery noConflict Mode
field.description: If you dont use jQuery 'noConflict' mode on your website, than enable it. (NOTE! if you use our 'JF Social' joomla template, you don't need to enable it.)

field.name: jfflex_slide_1_image_1
field.label: Slide #1 / 1-st Image
field.description: Choose 1-st Image.

field.name: jfflex_slide_1_image_2
field.label: Slide #1 / 2-nd Image
field.description: Choose 2-nd Image (Dont choose if you dont want to show 2-nd image) (NOTE! make sure that you have chosen first image, if not, this slide won't be shown).

field.name: jfflex_slide_1_image_3
field.label: Slide #1 / 3-rd Image
field.description: Choose 3-rd Image (Dont choose if you dont want to show 2-nd image) (NOTE! make sure that you have chosen first image, if not, this slide won't be shown).

field.name: jfflex_slide_1_image_4
field.label: Slide #1 / 4-th Image
field.description: Choose 4-th Image (Dont choose if you dont want to show 2-nd image) (NOTE! make sure that you have chosen first image, if not, this slide won't be shown).

field.name: jfflex_slide_1_title
field.label: Slide #1 / Title
field.description: Type Tittle Text (Leave it empty if you dont want to show this title).

field.name: jfflex_slide_1_title_style
field.label: Slide #1 / Title Style
field.description: Type Title CSS Style, for example if you want to change its position: 'top:50px;bottom:auto;margin-left:200px;'

field.name: jfflex_slide_1_small_btn_text
field.label: Slide #1 / Small Btn Text
field.description: Type Small Button Text (Leave it empty if you dont want to show this button).

field.name: jfflex_slide_1_small_btn_link
field.label: Slide #1 / Small Btn Link
field.description: Type Small Button Link (for example: https://www.google.com/).

field.name: jfflex_slide_1_small_btn_target
field.label: Slide #1 / Small Btn Target
field.description: Choose Small Button Target

field.name: jfflex_slide_1_small_btn_style
field.label: Slide #1 / Small Button Style
field.description: Type Small Button CSS Style, for example if you want to change its position: 'top:50px;bottom:auto;margin-left:200px;'

field.name: jfflex_slide_1_big_btn_text
field.label: Slide #1 / Big Btn Text
field.description: Type Big Button Text (Leave it empty if you dont want to show this button).

field.name: jfflex_slide_1_big_btn_link
field.label: Slide #1 / Big Btn Link
field.description: Type Big Button Link (for example: https://www.google.com/).

field.name: jfflex_slide_1_big_btn_target
field.label: Slide #1 / Big Btn Target
field.description: Choose Big Button Target

field.name: jfflex_slide_1_big_btn_style
field.label: Slide #1 / Big Button Style
field.description: Type Big Button CSS Style, for example if you want to change its position: 'top:50px;bottom:auto;margin-left:200px;'

field.name: jfflex_slide_9_small_btn_link
field.label: Slide #9 / Small Btn Link
field.description: Type Small Button Link (for example: https://www.google.com/).

field.name: jfflex_slide_9_small_btn_target
field.label: Slide #9 / Small Btn Target
field.description: Choose Small Button Target

field.name: jfflex_slide_9_small_btn_style
field.label: Slide #9 / Small Button Style
field.description: Type Small Button CSS Style, for example if you want to change its position: 'top:50px;bottom:auto;margin-left:200px;'

field.name: jfflex_slide_9_big_btn_text
field.label: Slide #9 / Big Btn Text
field.description: Type Big Button Text (Leave it empty if you dont want to show this button).

field.name: jfflex_slide_9_big_btn_link
field.label: Slide #9 / Big Btn Link
field.description: Type Big Button Link (for example: https://www.google.com/).

field.name: jfflex_slide_9_big_btn_target
field.label: Slide #9 / Big Btn Target
field.description: Choose Big Button Target

field.name: jfflex_slide_9_big_btn_style
field.label: Slide #9 / Big Button Style
field.description: Type Big Button CSS Style, for example if you want to change its position: 'top:50px;bottom:auto;margin-left:200px;'

field.name: jfflex_slide_10_image_1
field.label: Slide #10 / 1-st Image
field.description: Choose 1-st Image.

field.name: jfflex_slide_10_image_2
field.label: Slide #10 / 2-nd Image
field.description: Choose 2-nd Image (Dont choose if you dont want to show 2-nd image) (NOTE! make sure that you have chosen first image, if not, this slide won't be shown).

field.name: jfflex_slide_10_image_3
field.label: Slide #10 / 3-rd Image
field.description: Choose 3-rd Image (Dont choose if you dont want to show 2-nd image) (NOTE! make sure that you have chosen first image, if not, this slide won't be shown).

field.name: jfflex_slide_10_image_4
field.label: Slide #10 / 4-th Image
field.description: Choose 4-th Image (Dont choose if you dont want to show 2-nd image) (NOTE! make sure that you have chosen first image, if not, this slide won't be shown).

field.name: jfflex_slide_10_title
field.label: Slide #10 / Title
field.description: Type Tittle Text (Leave it empty if you dont want to show this title).

field.name: jfflex_slide_10_title_style
field.label: Slide #10 / Title Style
field.description: Type Title CSS Style, for example if you want to change its position: 'top:50px;bottom:auto;margin-left:200px;'

field.label: Slide #10 / Small Btn Text
field.description: Type Small Button Text (Leave it empty if you dont want to show this button).

field.label: Slide #10 / Small Btn Link
field.description: Type Small Button Link (for example: https://www.google.com/).

field.name: jfflex_slide_10_small_btn_target
field.label: Slide #10 / Small Btn Target
field.description: Choose Small Button Target

field.name: jfflex_slide_10_small_btn_style
field.label: Slide #10 / Small Button Style
field.description: Type Small Button CSS Style, for example if you want to change its position: 'top:50px;bottom:auto;margin-left:200px;'

field.label: Slide #10 / Big Btn Text
field.description: Type Big Button Text (Leave it empty if you dont want to show this button).

field.name: jfflex_slide_10_big_btn_link
field.label: Slide #10 / Big Btn Link
field.description: Type Big Button Link (for example: https://www.google.com/).
